definition: the whole course of an event from beginning to end/ins and outs/the fundamental and the incidental
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect/to stress the incidental over the fundamental/to put the cart before the horse

sentences.english: In his view, people spend far too much time putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 在他来看，人们老是本末倒置。

sentences.english: That man has reversed Genesis- man has make God to his image and likeness.
sentences.chinese: 人却本末倒置，以自己的形像塑造天主。

sentences.english: Construction in the field have to understand before proportions.
sentences.chinese: 建设部在房价的认识上已经到了本末倒置的地步。

sentences.english: There’s certainly nothingrational about putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 本末倒置当然没有任何理性可言。

sentences.english: Yet perhaps there's an upside to all of this.
We shouldn't put the cart before the horses.
You are simply putting the cart before the horse!
sentences.chinese: 你这根本就是本末倒置嘛。

sentences.english: But to blame the service for infidelity is to confuse cause and effect.
sentences.chinese: 但将夫妻不忠归罪在线约会则是本末倒置了。

sentences.english: In the meantime, make sure your hands do not upstage your ideas.
sentences.chinese: 在这同时，注意不要使打手势和表达思想本末倒置。

definition: principle/logic
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
in brief/in a word
consider/estimate
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
see 概括[gai4 kuo4]
variant of 宏旨[hong2 zhi3]
gist/main idea
to elucidate/to study and expound
lit. crooked and straight/fig. right and wrong, good and evil
name and reality/how sth is portrayed and what it is actually like
to study the underlying principles, esp. in neo-Confucian rational learning 理學|理学[li3 xue2]/word for Western natural sciences during late Qing
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
logical thinking
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]
